methods.javadoc: Get the TransientProjectManager singleton instance for the JVM @return TransientProjectManager singleton instance
methods.name: getTransientProjectManager
methods.comment: Get the TransientProjectManager singleton instance for the JVM

methods.javadoc:
Get the number of active transient project data instances
@return number of active transient project data instances
methods.name: getActiveProjectCount
methods.comment: Get the number of active transient project data instances

return.comment: number of active transient project data instances

methods.javadoc:
Force disposal of all transient projects associated with remote Ghidra URL
 connections. WARNING: This method intended for testing only.
methods.name: dispose
methods.comment:
Force disposal of all transient projects associated with remote Ghidra URL
 connections. WARNING: This method intended for testing only.

methods.name: getTransientProject
methods.comment:
Get the transient project associated with a specific Ghidra protocol 
 connector.  This method will establish a connection if needed.

params.name: readOnly
params.comment: true if project data should be treated as read-only

methods.name: cleanupProjectData
methods.comment: Remove a transient project data from this manager's instance map

params.name: repositoryInfo
params.comment: repository info for tracking transient project data

fields.javadoc:
Map of existing transient project data.  Weak value references
 are used to allow project data to be finalized and disposed
 automatically when all references are dropped.
fields.name: repositoryMap
fields.comment:
Map of existing transient project data.  Weak value references
 are used to allow project data to be finalized and disposed
 automatically when all references are dropped.
